transArray.content:
Facilities: Very complete
Hygiene: very clean
good environment
Service: Very attentive

Dear guest, thank you for your "all excellent" review. We will work hard to provide a better stay environment for our guests. Orange friends are also working hard to use the most considerate service to leave a lasting impression for every family member we welcome. We hope that you can pay more attention to Xiaojie. Xiaojue's growth cannot be separated from your support. Thank you very much for your review. We look forward to seeing you again. I wish you a happy life! Hotel Manager: Zhang Minghui
